name: rainbow puzzle 2021
description: A bright and colorful puzzle that will cheer you up. Each level consists of 16 elements that must be rotated to match all the elements. The game contains 9 levels. The game has a choice of levels and you can immediately start guessing any puzzle of your choice. With each level, the pictures become a little more difficult. Put all the elements correctly and the game will automatically move to the next level. If you lose, then click on the icon with a question mark and the game will tell you where to put the desired element. In the game, you can scroll through the levels without passing them, if they caused difficulty in passing, just click the right arrow. The game will delight you with pleasant graphics and calm music.
